tasks.execution_prompt: Create a Python script to fetch sample data from a public API (like JSONPlaceholder) and save it to data/raw/
Validate the fetched data for completeness and correctness. Log any issues found to data/validation_report.txt
Clean and normalize the data. Remove duplicates, handle missing values, and standardize formats. Save to data/cleaned/
Transform the cleaned data into analysis-ready format. Create aggregations and derived fields. Save to data/transformed/
Calculate descriptive statistics and create a statistical summary report in reports/statistics.md
Create Python scripts that generate data visualizations using matplotlib. Save scripts in visualizations/
Create a comprehensive data analysis report combining statistics and visualization descriptions in reports/final_report.md
